name: Speedrunner (ziekerd)
description:
Race your friends in Speedrunner (2)! 

First, select the number of screens you wish to speedrun.

Then jump and dash your way to the other side of the procedurally generated screen. However, be careful not to get hit by the falling sword or floating orb...

After you reach the end of the last screen your time is recorded and shown on screen: who is the fastest?

Arrow keys for moving, Spacebar for jumping, Shift for dashing, 'R' to generate a new screen and Tab to return to the main menu.
